timeline.bodyText:
I can see 2 problems here, take the following group hierarchy (OK it's twisted, but can happen):
     A
     |--- B
     |    |--- A
     |    |--- C   
     |--- C
     |    |--- D

It seems that with the suggested algorithm, the resulting list will:

Include A (the parent group, also sub-sub-group), but this is probably not an issue.
Not include D, C being skipped since already present as a subgroup of B probably an issue.
timeline.author: ataillefer

replies.bodyText: One solution could be to remove the duplicate filtering clause and use a HashSet (no duplicates) for the descendant groups.
